methods: abstract void onJoinedRoom(int statusCode, Room room) Called when the client attempts to join a real-time room.
abstract void onLeftRoom(int statusCode, String roomId) Called when the client attempts to leaves the real-time room.
abstract void onRoomConnected(int statusCode, Room room) Called when all the participants in a real-time room are fully connected.
abstract void onRoomCreated(int statusCode, Room room) Called when the client attempts to create a real-time room.
